page.title: 14VILLAGE FACILITIES
page.content: Both the villages of Sheepy Magna and Sibson are picturesque with a mixture of old and new. Both villages have established residents whose families have lived in the area for years and a transient population, people who move where their jobs dictate and live in the area to take advantage of village life. Due to the lack of public transport the villagers depend upon the use of private cars and in some cases taxis from nearby Atherstone. Both villages have a Post Office/ General Stores, a Church and a Public House serving food and drink. Sibson also has a Hotel on the A444. The pub is the focal point for people to gather for relaxation and the Atherstone Hunt and the North Warwickshire Beagles meet there.
